SEARCH
Package Model

Class CardBomb

java.lang.Object
Model.CardBomb
All Implemented Interfaces:
Card, Orders
public class CardBomb extends Object implements Card
Represents a Bomb card in the game, which allows a player to reduce the armies in an enemy country by half. This class stores the card owner and the target country, and provides logging for execution status. Implements the Card interface.
Author:
Yash Koladiya

    • validOrderCheck

      public Boolean validOrderCheck(CurrentState p_currentState)
      Validates whether the target country specified in the Bomb card exists in the current game state.

      If the country does not exist, logs an error and returns false.

      Specified by:
      validOrderCheck in interface Card
      Parameters:
      p_currentState - the current game state used to access the map and countries
      Returns:
      true if the target country exists; false otherwise

    • execute

      public void execute(CurrentState p_currentState)
      Executes the Bomb card action if the order is valid.

      Reduces the number of armies in the target country to half (minimum 1), updates the game state accordingly, and logs the result. If the order is invalid, logs an error message.

      Specified by:
      execute in interface Orders
      Parameters:
      p_currentState - the current state of the game used for validation, applying effects, and logging

    • valid

      public boolean valid(CurrentState p_currentState)
      Validates whether the Bomb card can be used based on game rules.

      Checks that:

      • The target country is not owned by the player.
      • The target country is a neighbor of at least one of the player's countries.
      • (Optional) No negotiation is in place with the target country.
      Logs an error and returns false if any condition fails.
      Specified by:
      valid in interface Orders
      Parameters:
      p_currentState - the current state of the game for validation and logging
      Returns:
      true if the Bomb card usage is valid; false otherwise
